peril.io

Class TextFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.io.TextFileReader

  • public final class TextFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads a external text file. Use scanFile(String, String) to get the lines of the desired text file.
    Since:
    2018-03-16
    Version:
    1.01.02
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    File

      • scanFile

        public static java.lang.String[] scanFile(java.lang.String directoryPath,
                                          java.lang.String filename)
        Retrieves the array of lines that denote a specified text file in a specified directory.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename of the file.
        directoryPath - The path of the parent directory to the file.
        Returns:
        The lines of the file.
